snippet: Patti S. Hart, the Yahoo director who headed the board search committee that picked Scott Thompson as the company's chief executive, will not stand for re-election, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Tuesday.
abstract: Patti S. Hart, the Yahoo director who headed the board search committee that picked Scott Thompson as the company's chief executive, will not stand for re-election, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Tuesday.

headline.main: Yahoo Director Who Vetted C.E.O. to Step Down
